ISSUE.TITLE: Upload CSV Import Error
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: NocoDB used as docker : false NocoDB version : 0.83.8 Database used in NC_DB URL : sqlite3 Project was created by clicking : New Project Database on which spreadsheet is created : sqlite3 OS on which NocoDB is running : Ubuntu 20.04.3 LTS Node.js version if running as node : v14.13.0 Database version : 3.33.0 **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Go to New/Existing Project -> Tables -> New/Existing table 2. Click on Action -> Upload CSV -> Select any csv file having all the required columns (id, title) -> Import 3. See error: POST /nc/xyz_op0t/api/v1/xyz/bulk 400 40 - 7.051 ms .returning() is not supported by sqlite3 and will not have any effect. **Expected behavior** The selected CSV file is supposed to be imported and shown as table. **Screenshots** ![Screenshot from 2021-12-18 23-31-02](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36279345/146651266-7e51be31-3aa1-4a6b-9177-5e23ea214762.png) ![Screenshot from 2021-12-18 23-32-22](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36279345/146651350-7953badf-56a1-44f2-b56d-2f9b30bd2a7c.png) ![Screenshot from 2021-12-18 23-32-26](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36279345/146651360-ee56d427-3ec1-4829-829b-8ca782485111.png) ![Screenshot from 2021-12-18 23-32-46](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36279345/146651370-77eb6eeb-b2ee-408b-bded-764eb4a50dee.png) ![Screenshot from 2021-12-18 23-32-49](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36279345/146651378-4c2081b4-1ac8-4776-87c2-e75c4b263f4e.png) ![Screenshot from 2021-12-18 23-33-14](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36279345/146651386-34f51369-98ae-48b0-974b-69b3e305fd77.png)
